issue.title: www.ralphlauren.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ralphlauren.com/cart](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ralphlauren.com%2Fcart) ### Comment > shopping cart and sign in button are being blocked ### Screenshots

issue.title: info.error-report.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://info.error-report.com/modal](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.error-report.com%2Fmodal) ### Comment > 와이 고수에서 애드가드 사용을 감지해요. ### Screenshots

[https://ygosu.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fygosu.com%2F) Other extensions used: | Bitdefender ### Issue configuration issue.title: com.tvcast.screen.mirroring.screensharing.screencasttotv
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tvcast.screen.mirroring.screensharing.screencasttotv

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||footballtv.info 


same domain appears here too:

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194386
